creativedroid.database

Class DatabaseAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • creativedroid.database.DatabaseAdapter<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventAdapter, PlaceAdapter, TaskAdapter

    public abstract class DatabaseAdapter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface to be implemented for each database to object adapter
    Author:
    Steph
